open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Port Elizabeth, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: Octotel Maintenance | Cape Town

updates.content: A high loss was detected on an overhead optic fiber cable 4.7km from Louis Trichardt between Bandelierskop and Farm Mampakuil. Technicians are on site investigating.
Optic fiber cable technicians are on site investigating with the assistance of the Network field technician. Update to follow at 08:30.

Network field technician arrived at Nzhelele and confirmed that the optic fiber cable is partially damaged 20.4km towards Sibasa. Cable technicians are being re-dispatched to investigate, as it is suspected that the service provider damaged the optic fiber.
